name: Stopping Boxes
description:
"Stopping Boxes" is a game in which you will have to destroy boxes with the right color to colllect points, coins and trophies. As you get used to the game, it becomes even more challenging and interesting. It's a free to play game, and you don't need to worry about being disturbed by ads. 

 - Purchase powerful new hammers in the store.
 - View and share your achievements in the trophy room.

Download it now, and have fun!
